name: Mummy Defender
description:
This is  a mobile tower defense i made with a friend in around 2 weeks.

The game is avainable only in spanish.

You have 3 power ups for the game:

1.thunder: speed up your turret attacks for a limited time.

2.Bomb: spawn a bomb that makes lots of damage on enemies.

3.Clock: Spawns a huge sphere, everything inside it receives a debuff that slows down it's movement for a limited period of time.

Console:

/ayuda displays all the commands you can use.

/points give you certain ammount of points

/life gains more life

/freeturret new button for spawning turrents, but this one is free and random!

/lvl1/2/3 automatically goes to the selected level.
